  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/804</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Aquest any, física: El mocador que no es mulla</string>
            <string language="en">The handkerchief that doesn't get wet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Taschentuch, das nicht naß erhält</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouchoir qui ne devient pas humide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O lenço que não começa molhado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il fazzoletto che non ottiene bagnato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το χαρτομάνδηλο που δεν παίρνει υγρό</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Fitxa de la col-lecció "Aquest any, física!" que presenta un experiment en el qual es fan paleses la presència de l'aire i la pressió exercida per dos fluïds, l'aigua i l'aire. La fitxa conté un vídeo, una imatge, el guió de la pràctica i una qüestió amb resposta sobre l'experiment.</string>
            <string language="en">One of the activity cards in the collection "This year, Physics!" This one is an experiment showing the presence of air and the pressure exerted by two fluids: water and air. The card includes a video, an image, instructions for the experiment and a question and answer.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aire</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
            <string language="es">aire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen físic</string>
            <string language="en">physical phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aigua</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
            <string language="es">agua</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine der Aktivität Karten in der Ansammlung 
"dieses Jahr, Physik!" Dieses ist ein Experiment, welches das 
Vorhandensein der Luft und den Druck angewendet wird durch zwei 
Flüssigkeiten zeigt: Wasser und Luft. Die Karte schließt
einen Bildschirm, ein Bild, Anweisungen für das Experiment und eine 
Frage und eine Antwort ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une des cartes d'activité dans la collection 
"cette année, physique!" Celui-ci est une expérience montrant 
la présence d'air et la pression exercée par deux fluides : 
l'eau et air. La carte inclut un vidéo, une image, des 
instructions pour l'expérience et une question et une réponse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um dos cartões da atividade na coleção "este 
ano, física!" Este é uma experiência que mostra a presença 
do ar e a pressão exercida por dois líquidos: água e ar. 
O cartão inclui um vídeo, uma imagem, instruções para a 
experiência e uma pergunta e uma resposta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una delle schedi di attività nell'accumulazione 
"questo anno, fisica!" Questo è un esperimento che mostra la 
presenza di aria e la pressione impiegata da due liquidi: acqua 
ed aria. La scheda include un video, un'immagine, istruzioni per
l'esperimento e una domanda e una risposta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια από τις κάρτες δραστηριότητας στη συλλογή "αυτό 
το έτος, φυσική!" Αυτό είναι ένα πείραμα που εμφανίζει 
την παρουσία αέρα και την πίεση που ασκείται από δύο ρευστά: 
ύδωρ και αέρας. Η κάρτα περιλαμβάνει ένα βίντεο, μια
εικόνα, οδηγίες για το πείραμα και ερωταποκρίσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">körperliches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomène physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'eau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômeno físico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">aria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeno fisico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αέρας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσικό φαινόμενο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
